column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Yeah , do n't get too happy .
#Text=So do n't get frustrated if you do n't get it right away .
#Text=Just push and pull the water like this .
#Text=The key is getting the wrist movement right .
#Text=" Aang says : " Like this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's almost right .
#Text=If you keep practicing I 'm sure eventually — " Aang says : " Hey , I 'm bending it already !
#Text=" Katara says : " Wow , I ca n't believe you got that so quickly .
#Text=It took me two months to learn that move .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , you had to figure it all on your own .
#Text=I 'm lucky enough to have a great teacher .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thanks .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , what 's next ?
#Text=" Katara says : " This is a more difficult move .
#Text=I call it streaming the water .
#Text=It 's harder than it looks , so do n't be disappointed if - Nice work .
#Text=Though the over-the-head flare was unnecessary .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sorry .
#Text=Well , do n't stop now !
#Text=Keep 'em coming !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well I kind of know this one other move , but it 's pretty hard .
#Text=I have n't even totally figured it out yet .
#Text=The idea is to create a big , powerful wave .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , like this ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang ?!
#Text=" Aang says : " Looks like I got the hang of that move !
#Text=What else do you got ?
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's enough practicing for today .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , I 'll say !
#Text=You just " practiced " our supplies down the river .
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh , sorry .
#Text=I 'm sure we can find somewhere to replace all this stuff .
#Text=" Sokka says : " My life was hard enough when you were just an airbender .
#Text="
